How We Get You Recommended by AI

Setup takes 3-4 weeks. Results start appearing in 30-60 days (AI indexing takes time). Best results after 6+ months as network effects compound.

Step 1: Free 30-Minute Audit

See where you stand before committing.

Live AI testing: We test your business across ChatGPT, Claude, Perplexity, Grok in real-time. You watch as we ask questions like "best wineries in Barossa Valley" and see if you appear.

Competitor analysis: Which businesses in your region are winning AI recommendations and why.

Network opportunity mapping: We identify 3-5 potential partner businesses perfect for referral relationships.

Honest positioning workshop preview: We help you articulate what you actually are (not aspirational). Example: "Large operation perfect for tour buses" vs claiming "intimate boutique."

Custom roadmap: Exactly how we'd implement both parts (Network Effects + AI-Optimised Content) for your business.

Realistic projection: Expected improvements based on similar businesses. We give ranges, not guarantees.

No obligation. The audit alone gives you valuable insights.

Schedule your free audit →

Step 2: Setup (Week 1-4)

Week 1-2: Network Effects Setup

Network Partnership clients: We contact your chosen partners, invite them to join, coordinate kickoff meeting, create partnership agreements, set up referral tracking.

Individual clients: We identify ideal partners, provide outreach templates, show successful partnership examples.

All clients: We plan cross-linking strategy and identify natural collaboration opportunities.

Week 2-3: AI-Optimised Content Creation

Honest positioning workshop: 90-minute session to define what you actually are, target audience clarity, differentiation, review analysis.

Create your /ai directory: 10-15 Q&As in conversational format matching how travelers ask questions. Example: "Q: Best large-group wineries Barossa with tour bus access? A: We're a commercial operation perfect for groups of 20-50..."

Build llms.txt: Roadmap file pointing AI systems to your /ai content and listing network partners.

Basic content discovery: Configure robots.txt to allow AI crawlers, update sitemap, add internal links. Necessary housekeeping.

Week 3-4: Testing & Launch

AI platform testing: Test across ChatGPT, Claude, Perplexity, Grok with 10 query variations.

Crawler verification: Confirm AI crawlers are accessing your llms.txt and /ai files.

Network testing: Verify partner cross-references are indexed.

Baseline metrics: Document starting point (mention frequency, recommendation quality, competitive position).

Step 3: Ongoing Optimization (Monthly)

Weekly AI Monitoring

We test your business across all AI platforms weekly, tracking mention rates and trending queries.

Monthly Content Updates

Add 3-5 new Q&As targeting trending queries we identified

Seasonal adjustments: Update for harvest seasons, holiday periods, weather changes

New offerings: Add new tours, menu items, room types, experiences

Pricing updates: Keep package prices current

Network Coordination (Network Partnership Only)

Monthly calls: 45-minute Zoom aligning promotions (e.g., "Barossa Wine + Dine Weekend")

Quarterly strategy sessions: Full network meeting to plan seasonal campaigns

Referral tracking: Show each partner how many bookings came from network

Monthly Performance Report

AI mention frequency (% of relevant queries)

Platform breakdown (which AI systems mention you most)

Trending queries (new types of questions triggering your business)

Competitive position (your ranking vs. top competitors)

Content performance (which Q&As trigger most mentions)

Network referrals (if applicable)

Expected Timeline

Week 1-4: Setup

Files deployed, network partnerships established. AI hasn't indexed yet. Mention rate: 0-5% (baseline).

Week 5-8: Initial Indexing

Crawlers accessing your content. Not yet prioritized in recommendations. Mention rate: 5-15%.

Week 9-16: Acceleration

Consistent mentions increasing. Network validation occurring. Mention rate: 20-40%.

Week 17+: Sustained Performance

Stable mention rate. Top positioning in your category for right queries. Mention rate: 40-70% (varies by business and network participation).

Reality Check

Results depend on: business quality (reviews matter), regional competition, honest positioning execution, network participation, seasonal factors.

What You Need to Provide

Initial Setup (2-3 hours total)

Business details, website access, honest description of services, current pricing, recent review data

For positioning workshop: willingness to be honest, examples of happy/unhappy customers, what makes you different

For networks: potential partners, existing relationships, collaboration ideas

Ongoing (30 minutes monthly)

Monthly check-in call

Updates on new offerings, pricing changes, seasonal availability

Network clients: additional 45 minutes for coordination calls

When You Shouldn't Hire Us

Reviews below 3.5 stars: Fix quality issues first

Can't commit 6+ months: Results compound over time

Not ready for honest positioning: We'll clash if you insist on false claims

Want overnight results: AI indexing takes 30-60 days minimum
